scripts.broadcast: git remote | while read remote; do git push $remote master && git push --tags; done
scripts.version-release: mversion patch && git commit -am 'Release %s' --tag '%s' && npm run broadcast
scripts.version-devel: mversion preminor && git commit -am "Preparing for next development iteration ($(npm run version-current))" && npm run broadcast
scripts.version-bump: npm run version-release && npm run version-devel
